Pocatello.Reed Gym: Reed Gym is a 3,214-seat multi-purpose arena in the western United States, on the campus of Idaho State University in Pocatello, Idaho. Opened 67 years ago in 1951, it is the home court of the ISU Bengals women's basketball and volleyball teams of the Big Sky Conference. It also is the home of and men's and women's tennis teams and serves as a student recreational center.
